EmailTemplate.description: This template should ONLY be used to respond back to an external Customer. This template should be used if the Customer requested to escalate their out of policy cancellation request to the Customer Business Team (CBT) and the CBT has failed to respond or file an ACAT to waive the cancellation fee within 7 calendar days of escalation to the CBT.
EmailTemplate.name: Order Cancel Request - Out-of-Policy Final Response to External Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Cancellation Request {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are unable to cancel your order unless you agree to pay the cancellation fee. The total cancellation fee will be ________ which is ___% of your total order line value.
If you require additional support, please feel free to engage your current Customer Support/Account Manager.
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Purchase Order Number: <Enter Customer PO#> Sales Order Number: <Enter SAP SO#>
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
